QuestData.Title: Honeyfreeze Mead
QuestData.Description:
Right, so now that we've established somewhat friendlier relations and learned a wee bit of Winterpelt, it's about time tae make friends in the proper dwarf manner.
What gesture of friendship is better than a stiff drink tae ward off tae cold? Both dwarves and furbolgs have a long history of brewin', so we can call it somethin' of a cultural exchange too!
I saw some hearty lookin' bees a bit south of here. And where there's bees, there's honey. And where there's honey, there could be mead.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Honeyfreeze Honey for Sonova Snowden.
